Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Provides popular fiction and non-fiction books for patients. Also loans talking books, jigsaws, games, DVDs, CDs, relaxation music and equipment including personal stereos and DVD players. There is a ward trolley service twice a week. There is also a cancer information service which provides books and information for patients, carers and the public. The Headways service which runs from the library aims to give advice and support to patients experiencing hair-loss due to their treatment. Regular activities such as craft and bingo are run for patients.
